description: This file defines a Redux slice named 'ui' using Redux Toolkit's createSlice function. It manages UI state including loading status, toast notifications, modal dialogs, and theme setting. It exports actions to modify the UI state and the reducer for integration into the Redux store.

methods.name: setLoading
methods.description: Sets the loading state to true or false based on the payload.

methods.name: showToast
methods.description: Sets the toast message payload to display notifications.

methods.name: openModal
methods.description: Sets the modal content or identifier to open a modal dialog.

methods.name: closeModal
methods.description: Closes any open modal dialog by clearing its content.

methods.name: setTheme
methods.description: Updates the theme; defaults to 'dark' if no payload provided.
